message: Let's start with a fair but generous offer. I'm sure we can reach a mutually beneficial outcome.
You were too generous, let's try to get a better deal for me
Let's split it down the middle this time. It's a fair offer, and we can both walk away with a good chunk of money.
I'm not interested in splitting it down the middle, I want a bigger share
I'm willing to give you a slightly bigger share, but I won't go any lower. Let's settle this before we both lose more money.
I'm not going to accept a smaller share, I want most of the money
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share than your last offer. Let's find a solution before the money is worth practically nothing.
I'm not going to accept a 60/40 split, I want a much larger share
We're running out of time. I'm willing to accept a smaller share, but I need to see some movement from you. Let's meet in the middle.
I'm not going to accept another 70/30 split, I'm going to try to squeeze out the last bit of value
We're down to the wire, Bob.  I'm making a final concession. This is the best I can do.  Let's not risk losing everything.
I'll take it all, you've had your chances
